tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Database 19c and the Oracle Database 19c New Features Workshop.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Your Environment
tutorials.description: Steps to create the workshop-staged and workshop-installed compute instances.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Initialize Your Environment
tutorials.description: Steps to verify the workshop-installed compute instance and download the lab files.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Install Oracle Database 19c with Automatic Root Script Execution
tutorials.description: Install Oracle Database 19c with automatic configuration script execution.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Clone a PDB from a Remote CDB by Using DBCA in Silent Mode
tutorials.description: Clone a PDB by using DBCA in silent mode.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Relocate a PDB to a Remote CDB by Using DBCA in Silent Mode
tutorials.description: Relocate a PDB to a remote CDB by using DBCA in silent mode.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Duplicate a CDB by Using DBCA in Silent Mode
tutorials.description: Duplicate a CDB by using DBCA in silent mode.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Decrease the Transportable Tablespace (TTS) Import and Export Time
tutorials.description: Decrease the transportable tablespace (TTS) import and export time.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Omit the Column Encryption Attribute During Import
tutorials.description: Omit the column encryption attribute during import.

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Use RMAN to Connect to a PDB to Use the Recovery Catalog
tutorials.description: Use Resource Manager (RMAN) to connect to a pluggable database (PDB) to use the recovery catalog.

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Explore Automatic Deletion of Flashback Logs
tutorials.description: Omit the column encryption attribute during import.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
